content.raw:
Confirmed that logging for the ur10 in ariac is fixed with this PR.



There looks to be an invalid SDF being parsed somewhere though, because I see:

```
Error [parser_urdf.cc:3474] Unable to call parseURDF on robot model
Error [parser.cc:342] parse as old deprecated model file failed.

```

but only when logging is enabled (`roslaunch osrf_gear sample_environment.launch state_logging:=true`). Related ticket: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/issues/151/trying-to-parse-an-invalid-file-gives-urdf

A similar error showed up at some point in #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2608 that required a fix in sdformat 4.3 (I have sdformat 5.3), but I'm not sure if it's the same cause.

There looks to be an invalid SDF being parsed somewhere though, because I see:

Error [parser_urdf.cc:3474] Unable to call parseURDF on robot model
Error [parser.cc:342] parse as old deprecated model file failed.

but only when logging is enabled (roslaunch osrf_gear sample_environment.launch state_logging:=true). Related ticket: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/issues/151/trying-to-parse-an-invalid-file-gives-urdf

A similar error showed up at some point in #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2608 that required a fix in sdformat 4.3 (I have sdformat 5.3), but I'm not sure if it's the same cause.
